name: Cool Ocean Palette
description: Cool blues and teals creating calm, refreshing, and serene atmosphere

prompt.base: Cool ocean color palette, calming blues and teals, aquatic tones, cool color scheme, ocean hues, refreshing colors, serene palette, water-inspired
prompt.positive: cool ocean colors, deep blue (#0077BE), bright cyan (#00C9FF), teal (#00A8E8), cool palette, ocean hues, refreshing colors, serene atmosphere, aquatic tones, water colors, cool color harmony
prompt.negative: warm colors, oranges, reds, hot palette, saturated warm tones, fiery colors, desert tones

technical.use_cases: Calm scenes, water environments, serene moods, refreshing atmospheres

variations.name: Deep Ocean
variations.modifier: dark blues, deep water, mysterious depths, nautical atmosphere, submarine palette

variations.name: Tropical Ocean
variations.modifier: bright teals, clear water, paradise atmosphere, vacation vibes, Caribbean palette

variations.name: Arctic Ocean
variations.modifier: icy blues, cold water, frozen atmosphere, polar vibes, glacial palette

examples: An underwater scene with cool ocean palette, calming blues and teals, serene aquatic atmosphere
A coastal landscape with ocean colors, refreshing blue tones, calm and peaceful mood
